unit_learning_outcomes.description: evaluate musical ideas and participate in shared creativity both in class and online.
produce and time-manage creative and research projects.
practice independent problem-solving and analytical judgement in the application of specialized software in music making.
apply proficiency with technological composition and musical creativity.
analyse and describe creative musical works.

non_scheduled_learning_activities.description: Independent research: Complete online readings and research production approaches.
Critical listening: Conduct musical analysis of relevant recorded works.

assessments.description: Students will produce a short 1 – 2 minute audio recording in a digital audio workstation that demonstrates introductory skills in audio editing and management. Refer to iLearn for further information.
Students will produce a process diary that documents the creative and technical processes employed in both project assessments for this unit. Refer to iLearn for further information.
Students will complete a short 2 minute work for software synthesisers and MIDI sequencing that makes use of real-time controllers. Refer to iLearn for further information.

data.unit_offering_text:
Session 1, Weekday attendance, North Ryde
Session 1, Special circumstances
data.subject_search_title: MMCC2020 - Music Production: The Virtual Studio

academic_org.value: Department of Media, Communications, Creative Arts, Language and Literature

data.description: Contemporary music production and composition is increasingly reliant on computer technology. In this unit, students are introduced to principles of composition and production using specialized software programs and virtual instruments. Students develop technical skills as well as compositional literacy. Creativity is encouraged, as students produce original musical works within the dedicated music computer laboratory. While music production software is used in this unit, no prior computer production or musical ability is necessary.
data.search_title: MMCC2020 - Music Production: The Virtual Studio
